items.title: The risks of AI-generated code are real — here’s how enterprises can manage the risk
items.description: AI generated code is set to dominate application development. Here's what enterprises can do now to lower the risk.

items.title: Nvidia’s GTC keynote will emphasize AI over gaming
items.description: Don't expect to hear a lot about better framerates and raytracing at the Nvidia GTC keynote. AI will instead be the subject of the day.

items.title: New technique helps LLMs rein in CoT lengths, optimizing reasoning without exploding compute costs
items.description: Carnegie Mellon University researchers propose a new LLM training technique that gives developers more control over chain-of-thought length.

items.title: Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking now has memory and Google apps integration
items.description: Google makes Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking Experimental more personal by connecting more Google apps and services.

items.title: Patronus AI’s Judge-Image wants to keep AI honest — and Etsy is already using it
items.description: Patronus AI launches the first multimodal LLM-as-a-Judge for evaluating AI systems that process images, with Etsy already implementing the technology ...
